Title: 1. The Exorcist
description: When a mysterious entity possesses a young girl, her mother seeks the help of two Catholic priests to save her life.

Title: 2. The Sting
description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

Title: 3. American Graffiti
description: A group of teenagers in California's central valley spend one final night after their 1962 high school graduation cruising the strip with their buddies before they pursue their varying goals.

Title: 4. Papillon
description: A French convict in the 1930s befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence in the South American penal colony on Devil's Island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

Title: 5. The Way We Were
description: During post-WWII McCarthyism, a diametrically opposed couple come together only to find out that genuine friendship and physical attraction is not enough to overcome fundamental societal beliefs.

Title: 6. Magnum Force
description: Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan pursues a conspiracy of vigilante cops, who are not above going beyond the law to kill San Francisco's undesirables.

Title: 7. Live and Let Die
description: James Bond is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organisation and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

Title: 8. Serpico
description: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

Title: 9. Sleeper
description: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

Title: 10. High Plains Drifter
description: A gun-fighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

Title: 11. Battle for the Planet of the Apes
description: Ten years after a worldwide series of ape revolutions and a brutal nuclear war among humans, Caesar must protect survivors of both species from an insidious human cult and a militant ape faction alike.

Title: 12. The Day of the Dolphin
description: A marine biologist teaches his dolphins to communicate in English but shady characters plan to kidnap the trained mammals for a more sinister purpose.

Title: 13. The Wicker Man
description: A puritan police sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl, who the pagan locals claim never existed.

Title: 14. Amarcord
description: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.

Title: 15. A Bigger Splash
description: Semi-fictionalized documentary biopic of British artist David Hockney. After a difficult break-up, Hockney is left unable to paint, much to the concern of his friends. Titled after Hockney's pop-art painting 'A Bigger Splash'.

Title: 16. The Holy Mountain
description: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a messianic character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

Title: 17. The Mother and the Whore
description: The chauvinist Alexandre balances relationships with several women in the post-1968 intellectual scene of Paris.

Title: 18. Mean Streets
description: In New York City's Little Italy, a devoutly Catholic mobster must reconcile his desire for power, his feelings for his epileptic girlfriend, and his devotion to his troublesome friend.

Title: 19. Enter the Dragon
description: A Shaolin martial artist travels to an island fortress to spy on an opium lord - who is also a former monk from his temple - under the guise of attending a fighting tournament.

Title: 20. Ganja & Hess
description: After being stabbed with an ancient, germ-infested knife, a doctor's assistant finds himself with an insatiable desire for blood.

Title: 21. Wattstax
description: Documentary covering a Stax Records-sponsored all-day concert at the 1972 Watts Summer Festival with performances by Stax Records artists such as Isaac Hayes, Rufus Thomas, The Staples Singers, and more.

Title: 22. The Fate of Lee Khan
description: Lee Khan, a high official under Mongolian Emperor Yuan of the Yuan dynasty (year 1366) procures the battle map of the Chinese rebel Chu Yuan-Chang's army. Rebel spies, aided by treachery within Khan's ranks, strive to corner him in an inn.

Title: 23. Detroit 9000
description: After a fundraiser for a black politician is robbed, Detroit police put two detectives, one white and one black, on the case, who try to work together under boiling political pressure.

Title: 24. Day for Night
description: A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.

Title: 25. Westworld
description: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

Title: 26. Badlands
description: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town, and her older greaser boyfriend, embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota Badlands.

Title: 27. The Day of the Jackal
description: In the aftermath of France allowing Algeria's independence, a group of resentful military veterans hire a professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" to kill President Charles de Gaulle.

Title: 28. Robin Hood
description: The story of the legendary British outlaw portrayed with the characters as anthropomorphic animals.

Title: 29. Scarecrow
description: An ex-con drifter with a penchant for brawling is amused by a homeless ex-sailor, so they partner up as they head east together.

Title: 30. Soylent Green
description: A nightmarish futuristic fantasy about the controlling power of big corporations and an innocent cop who stumbles on the truth.

Title: 31. The Last of Sheila
description: A year after Sheila is killed by a hit-and-run driver, her wealthy husband invites a group of friends to spend a week on his yacht playing a scavenger hunt mystery game. The game turns out to be all too real and all too deadly.

Title: 32. Paper Moon
description: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

Title: 33. Don't Look Now
description: A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.

Title: 34. Jesus Christ Superstar
description: Film version of the musical stage play, presenting the last few weeks of Christ's life told in an anachronistic manner.

Title: 35. The Long Goodbye
description: Private eye Philip Marlowe helps friend Terry Lennox out of a jam and is implicated in his wife Sylvia's murder. He also is hired by Eileen Wade to locate her dipsomaniac husband Roger, who frequently disappears when he wants to dry out.

Title: 36. The Three Musketeers
description: A young swordsman comes to Paris and faces villains, romance, adventure and intrigue with three Musketeer friends.

Title: 37. Fantastic Planet
description: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

Title: 38. The Outfit
description: Earl Macklin robs a bank owned by the mob, serves his prison time and is released, only to start a private war against the crime outfit that owned the bank.

Title: 39. Pat Garrett & Billy the Kid
description: Pat Garrett is hired as a lawman on behalf of a group of wealthy New Mexico cattle barons to bring down his old friend Billy the Kid.

Title: 40. The Last Detail
description: Two Navy men are ordered to bring a young offender to prison, but decide to show him one last good time along the way.

Title: 41. The Seven-Ups
description: Tough detective Buddy leads an elite New York City unit to convict felons and jail them for a minimum of seven years. Buddy is trying to find out who killed his partner but uncovers a plot to kidnap mobsters for money.

Title: 42. Coffy
description: A nurse serves inner-city drug dealers with some vigilante justice after her sister becomes their latest victim.

Title: 43. Belladonna of Sadness
description: After being raped by an evil feudal lord and subsequently getting banished from her village, a peasant girl makes a pact with the Devil to gain magical powers and take her revenge.

Title: 44. My Name Is Nobody
description: A young, easy-going gunman worships and competes with a famed gunfighter, insisting that he must face down a gang of 150 outlaws before he can retire.

Title: 45. Thriller: A Cruel Picture
description: A young woman, rendered mute after a childhood sexual assault, undertakes training in firearms, martial arts and driving to wreak vengeance upon those who have forced her into prostitution.

Title: 46. Immoral Tales
description: An erotic collection of short stories, an anthology comprised of tantalizing tales about sexual desire and its diverse manifestations.

Title: 47. 14 and Under
description: A series of "sex reports" intended to address the issue of pedophilia in the early 1970s.

Title: 48. Invasion of the Bee Girls
description: A powerful cosmic force is turning Earth women into queen bees who kill men by wearing them out sexually.

Title: 49. Charlotte's Web
description: Wilbur is a farm pig who's terrified that he'll end up on the dinner table. His friend Charlotte, a charming spider, comes to his rescue. She weaves words into her web, convincing the farmer that Wilbur is too special a pig to kill.

Title: 50. Sssssss: Silbido De Muerte
description: A college student becomes lab assistant to a scientist who is working on a serum that can transform humans into snakes.

Title: 51. Turkish Delight
description: An aimless young artist learns to face his responsibilities when a former lover develops a terminal illness.

Title: 52. The Baby
description: A social worker, still reeling from the loss of her architect husband, investigates the eccentric, psychedelic Wadsworth Family, consisting of a mother, two daughters, and an adult son with the apparent mental capacity of an infant.

Title: 53. The Cheerleaders
description: A group of cheerleaders from the local high school decide to show their school spirit for their football team by sleeping with the opponents the night before the game so that they can be so worn out the opposition won't be able to play.

Title: 54. The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
description: Sinbad and the vizier of Marabia, followed by evil magician Koura, seek the three golden tablets that can gain them access to the ancient temple of the Oracle of All Knowledge.

Title: 55. Walking Tall
description: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser, who almost single-handedly cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

Title: 56. Scorpio
description: During the Cold War, the CIA orders free-lance operative Scorpio to assassinate his former CIA mentor Cross and a deadly cat-and-mouse game ensues.

Title: 57. The Paper Chase
description: A first-year law student at Harvard Law School struggles with balancing his coursework and a woman, unaware that she has a connection that affects their relationship.

Title: 58. Pets
description: A troubled young woman escapes her abusive brother accepting the kindness of strangers. Exploited, she perseveres thanks to growing street-smarts hoping that her next encounter will be with someone with a pureness of heart equal to her own

Title: 59. Breezy

Title: 60. Malicious

Title: 61. Torso

Title: 62. The Big Feast
description: A group of men go to a villa in the French countryside where they resolve to eat themselves to death.

Title: 63. White Lightning
description: A prisoner is released from custody on the condition that he becomes a stool pigeon for the FBI to help them incriminate a corrupt sheriff.

Title: 64. Lady Snowblood

Title: 65. Female Vampire

Title: 70. The Devil's Plaything
description: A lesbian vampire's soul is kept on in the bodies of her descendants.

Title: 71. Black Mama White Mama
description: A Black prostitute and a white revolutionary must form an uneasy alliance when they are busted out of prison, then pursued by guerrillas, bounty hunters and the Army.

Title: 72. Cahill U.S. Marshal

Title: 73. The Last American Hero
description: A young hell raiser quits moonshine running to try to become the best NASCAR racer the South has ever seen.

Title: 74. Godspell
description: An adaption of the musical, in a modern-day song-and-dance recreation of the Gospel of St. Matthew.

Title: 75. Charley Varrick
description: A man, his wife and their friend stage a bloody bank robbery without realizing they are stealing from the Mob.

Title: 76. Cinderella Liberty

description: A gunhand named Lane is hired by a widow, Mrs. Lowe, to find gold stolen by her husband so that she may return it and start fresh.

Title: 78. The Spirit of the Beehive
description: In 1940, after watching and being traumatized by the movie Frankenstein (1931), a sensitive seven-year-old girl living in a small Spanish village drifts into her own fantasy world.

Title: 79. Anita
description: Anita, a young woman with a troubled childhood and a hunger for love, finds a soul mate in Erik, a kindly college student.

Title: 80. Theater of Blood
description: A Shakespearean actor takes poetic revenge on the critics who denied him recognition.

Title: 81. The Hourglass Sanatorium
description: Józef visits his dying father at a remote mental institution, where time itself doesn't seem to exist, and the line between dreams and memories becomes indistinguishable.

Title: 82. The Demons
description: A group of nuns become possessed by demons and are then tortured in a dungeon of horrors during the inquisition.

Title: 83. Lolly-Madonna XXX
description: In the early 1970s, a young woman passing through rural Tennessee unintentionally gets caught in a feud between two local neighboring clans, the Feathers and the Gutshalls.

Title: 84. Sinner: The Secret Diary of a Nymphomaniac
description: Linda Vargas picks up Ortiz in a bar where she works in a lesbian show with Maria Toledano.

Title: 85. A Virgin Among the Living Dead
description: Following the death of her father, a young girl visits her estranged family at their sinister castle in the countryside, and comes to realize her eccentric and morbid relatives are not quite alive.

Title: 86. The Crazies
description: The military attempts to contain a manmade combat virus that causes death and permanent insanity in those infected, as it overtakes a small Pennsylvania town.

Title: 87. The Laughing Policeman
description: In San Francisco, California, one victim in a mass murder is a police detective. His partner and a new partner investigate in the city's seamy side.

Title: 88. Tom Sawyer
description: Tom Sawyer and Huckleberry Finn investigate a suspicious graveyard murder and more in this musical version of Mark Twain's novel.

Title: 89. Emperor of the North
description: In 1933, during the Depression, Shack the brutal conductor of the number 19 train has a personal vendetta against the best train hopping hobo tramp in the Northwest, A No. 1.

Title: 90. Electra Glide in Blue
description: A motorcycle cop with a Harley-Davidson ties hippies to a murder in the Arizona desert.

Title: 91. Hollywood 90028
description: A struggling photographer takes a job in the porn industry. Unable to handle the degradation, he begins murdering young women to vent his frustrations.

Title: 92. The Satanic Rites of Dracula
description: In 1974, Professor Lorrimer Van Helsing investigates a satanic cult on behalf of Scotland Yard, only to discover a plot by Count Dracula to commit global genocide.

Title: 93. The Vault of Horror
description: An anthology of five horror stories shared by five men trapped in the basement of an office building.

Title: 94. Cannibal Girls
description: A young couple spend the night in an old farmhouse owned by a reverend, only to find out that it is also lived in by beautiful women who hunger after human flesh.

Title: 95. Bang the Drum Slowly
description: The story of the friendship between the New York Mammoths major-league baseball team's worldly-wise pitcher Henry "Author" Wiggen and half-wit catcher Bruce Pearson as they cope with Bruce's terminal illness during a baseball season.

Title: 96. Executive Action
description: Rogue intelligence agents, right-wing politicians, greedy capitalists, and free-lance assassins plot and carry out the JFK assassination.

Title: 97. Lost Horizon
description: While escaping war-torn China, a group of Europeans crash in the Himalayas, where they are rescued and taken to the mysterious Valley of the Blue Moon, Shangri-La.

Title: 98. Beyond Atlantis
description: A band of adventurers invade a native island determined to grab a reported fortune in buried treasure. The islanders are just as determined to keep their sacred treasure. Complications ensue.

Title: 99. Secrets of Naked Girls
description: Ugo Domani has landed as a guest worker in Germany and works in municipal waste collection. As a constantly sharp-edged Papagallo, he is sexually constantly under power and craves for German women.

Title: 100. 'Gator Bait
description: Desiree lives deep in the swamp and supports herself and her siblings by poaching. Ben and deputy Billy hope to get a little sexual comfort from the "Cajun swamp rat" when they catch Desiree trapping 'gators, and give chase. Desiree outsmarts them but Billy accidentally shoots Ben and tells his sheriff dad that Desiree did it. Ben's dad and sons join them in the search party and quickly get out of control. Soon the hunters become the hunted as Desiree exacts her revenge for their violence against her family.

Title: 101. Ludwig
description: The reign of the tormented Ludwig, king of Bavaria, from 1864 to 1886.

Title: 102. Sugar Cookies
description: After an actress is murdered by a pornographer during an erotic "game" that is made to look like a suicide, her lesbian lover uses another aspiring starlet as a pawn to exact revenge.

Title: 103. Three Wishes for Cinderella
description: Life changes dramatically for a Czech housemaid when the family coachman gives her three magical hazelnuts.

Title: 104. Shamus
description: Millions in diamonds are stolen from a New York City safe, and later the burglar is killed. Shamus is paid $10,000 by the owner to find the diamonds or the killer.

Title: 105. Terminal Island
description: After the abolishment of the death penalty, California murderers are dumped on an island to spend the rest of their lives unsupervised. There, two groups are formed, one lead by a psychopath, and another group determined to bring him down.

Title: 106. Dillinger
description: John Dillinger and his gang go on a bank robbing spree across the midwest, but one G-Man is determined to bring him down.

Title: 107. Eugenie de Sade
description: After a bashful young woman discovers that her famed wordsmith stepfather is a psychopathic deviant, she becomes an accomplice in his murderous sex games.

Title: 108. The Mack
description: Goldie returns from five years at the state pen and winds up King of the pimping game. Trouble comes in the form of two corrupt white cops and a crime lord who wants him to return to the small time.

Title: 109. The Offence
description: A burnt-out British police detective finally snaps whilst interrogating a suspected child molester.

Title: 110. Save the Tiger
description: Troubled garment manufacturer Harry Stoner tries to make his small debt-ridden factory survive, hires an arsonist to burn down a building so Harry can collect the insurance money, he pimps for clients, and has flashbacks to the war.

Title: 111. Lisa and the Devil
description: A tourist spends the night in a derelict Spanish villa seemingly held in the supernatural grip of an eccentric butler, who resembles a depiction of the Devil she had seen on an old fresco.

Title: 112. Wonder Women
description: While looking into the disappearance of a jai alai athlete, an insurance investigator is targeted by the sexy all-girl army of rogue transplant surgeon Dr. Tsu.

Title: 113. Seduction
description: Giuseppe commits to love a woman he hasn't seen in 15 years, amid dangers of seduction from her daughter.

Title: 114. And Now the Screaming Starts!
description: England, 1795: the young Catherine has just married Charles Fengriffen and moves into his castle. She becomes the victim of a curse that was laid on the family long ago. On her wedding night she is raped by a ghost and gets pregnant.

Title: 115. Sex & Fury
description: During the Meiji era, a gambler named Ochô takes revenge on the three dignitaries who killed her father, shelters a wanted anarchist, and crosses paths with a British femme fatale.

Title: 116. Carry on Girls
description: Sidney Fiddler organizes a beauty contest for a seaside town, but faces opposition from Councillor Prodworthy, who leads a women's liberation group aiming to sabotage the competition through disruption tactics.

Title: 117. Schoolgirl Report Part 5: What All Parents Should Know
description: Six more first-hand accounts of sexual awakening amongst school girls in the early Seventies - some with a happy end, some without.

Title: 118. The Iron Rose
description: A young couple out for a walk decide to take a stroll through a large cemetery. As darkness begins to fall they realize they can't find their way out, and soon their fears begin to overtake them.

Title: 119. The Last House on Dead End Street
description: After being released from prison, a young gangster with a chip on his shoulder decides to punish society by making snuff films.

Title: 120. O Lucky Man!
description: An ambitious coffee salesman has a series of improbable and ironic adventures that seem designed to challenge his naive idealism.

Title: 121. Cleopatra Jones
description: During the 1970s, U.S. Special Agent Cleopatra Jones proves to be an invaluable asset to the local police forces in the war on drugs.

Title: 122. Story of a Cloistered Nun
description: Refusing an arranged marriage, young aristocrat Carmela is sent to a convent. Her arrival intensifies the power struggle between the debauched nun Elizabeth, and the stern but evil Mother Superior, as both are smitten by Carmela's beauty.

Title: 123. Baba Yaga
description: A photographer finds herself falling under the spell of a witch.

Title: 124. F for Fake
description: A documentary about fraud and fakery.

Title: 125. The Harrad Experiment
description: At the Ivy League Harrad College, Professor Phillip Tenhausen and his wife Margaret incorporate a course on sexual relations into its curriculum. Based on Robert Rimmer's novel.

Title: 126. The Iceman Cometh
description: A salesman with a sudden passion for reform has an idea to sell to his barfly buddies: throw away your pipe dreams. The drunkards, living in a flophouse above a saloon, resent the idea.

Title: 127. Black Snake
description: Story of a slave revolt on a 19th-century Caribbean island.

Title: 128. Bummer
description: A touring small-time rock band called The Group picks up a couple of groupies. One night, the band's drunken, hulking bass player goes nuts and rapes the girls. The band refuses to believe that he's trouble, which leads to more tragedy.

Title: 129. Don Juan, or If Don Juan Were a Woman
description: A modern-day Don Juan-styled woman, who prides herself in the destruction of men who have fallen for her charms, reveals to a priest the murder she has committed and honestly details her past sexual encounters.

Title: 130. The MacKintosh Man
description: A member of British Intelligence assumes a fictitious criminal identity and allows himself to be caught, imprisoned, and freed in order to infiltrate a spy organization and expose a traitor.

Title: 131. Black Caesar
description: Raised in Harlem, Tommy Gibbs becomes a successful mob boss but he clashes with the rival Mafia and his old enemy, dirty cop McKinney.

Title: 132. White Cargo
description: Albert is a bumbling civil servant, who dreams that he is a Bond-like secret agent. He gets involved in a plot to smuggle young women out to the Middle East. More by luck than judgment he manages to thwart the baddies and save the day.

Title: 133. Don't Look in the Basement
description: A young psychiatric nurse goes to work at a remote asylum following a murder. There, she experiences varying degrees of torment from the patients.

Title: 134. The Death Wheelers
description: An amiable, psychopathic leader of a violent teen motorbike gang is spurred by his mother, a Satan-worshiping spiritual medium, into committing suicide and returning to life as an "undead".

Title: 135. Le Magnifique
description: Writing his 43rd spy novel, François includes people from his life. He's the competent, sophisticated secret agent Bob in stark contrast to François. His cute neighbor is Tatiana who helps Bob in Acapulco.

Title: 136. Shaft in Africa
description: Private investigator John Shaft is recruited to go undercover to break up a modern slavery ring where young Africans are lured to Paris to do chain-gang work.

Title: 137. The Stone Killer
description: A top New York detective is sent to Los Angeles where he must solve a case involving an old Sicilian Mafia family feud.

Title: 138. Alvin Purple
description: Waterbed salesman Alvin consults a psychiatrist about his irresistibilty to women.

Title: 139. The Killing Kind
description: A young Terry Lambert returns home after serving a prison sentence for a gang rape he was forced to participate in. He seeks revenge on his lawyer and the girl who framed him.

Title: 140. Liebe zwischen Tür und Angel - Vertreterinnen-Report
description: A fiercely beautiful female executive goes to a meeting filled with male executives. One by one they each describe their erotic stories in this out of control, exciting expose of a traveling salesman.

Title: 141. Night of Fear
description: Insane sadistic hermit stalks and captures those who get lost in his part of the woods. A young woman whose car broke down is about to find out what he does with them next.

Title: 142. Lemora: A Child's Tale of the Supernatural
description: A young girl who returns to her hometown to see her dying father finds herself being drawn into a web of vampirism and witchcraft.

Title: 143. Scream Blacula Scream
description: The vampire Mamuwalde (a.k.a. Blacula) is resurrected by voodoo and forced to kill again.

Title: 144. The Creeping Flesh
description: A Victorian-age scientist returns to London with his paleontological bag-of-bones discovery from Papua New Guinea. Unfortunately, when exposed to water, flesh returns to the bones unleashing a malevolent being on the scientist's family and friends.

Title: 145. The Vampires Night Orgy
description: A busload of tourists stops in to visit a small European town. What they don't know is that the town is completely inhabited by vampires.

Title: 146. Hitler: The Last Ten Days
description: A dramatization based on eyewitness accounts of Hitler's final days in an underground bunker, his military henchmen, and his stormy relationship with Eva Braun.

Title: 147. Chino
description: A runaway teenager and a mixed-race horse breeder strike an unlikely friendship in the context of common hardships.

Title: 148. Blue Summer
description: Teenagers pack a van full of beer and go on the road in search of sexual adventures.

Title: 149. Love & Anarchy
description: When a friend is murdered by the Facists, a melancholy farmer takes up residence in a Roman brothel as he and an anarchist prostitute plot to assassinate Mussolini.

Title: 150. Massage Parlor Murders!
description: A serial killer targets and murders sex workers in New York City's red-light district. Detectives Rizotti and O'Mara investigate to uncover the killer's identity and prevent further victims.

Title: 151. Hell Up in Harlem
description: A gangster in Harlem must rescue his ex-wife, who has been kidnapped by the Mafia.

description: In the last days of WW2, women are volunteering from all over Germany to serve in the front lines by having sex with Nazi soldiers.

description: Executive Rick Engels picks up beautiful young hitchhikers Carol and Judy and takes them back to his swanky mansion for illicit carnal purposes. However, the two lovely lasses prove to be a lot more than he can easily handle.

Title: 154. Godzilla vs. Megalon
description: An inventor creates a robot that is seized by an undersea kingdom to guide their monster god in attacking the surface as retaliation for the nuclear tests that have devastated their society.

Title: 155. Jonathan Livingston Seagull
description: A skilled flyer but very rebellious young seagull is kicked out of his clan. However, instead of being sad or lonely, he decides to enjoy and explore his newfound freedom.

Title: 156. The Reincarnation of Isabel
description: A group of vampires keep the body of a witch in a castle cellar. They require virgin blood to resurrect her. A party of people arrive and things kick off.

Title: 157. Savage Abduction
description: A sexual pervert murders a businessman's wife, then blackmails the businessman into procuring young girls for him to torture and kill. The businessman hires a biker gang to kidnap two young girls for that purpose.

Title: 158. Count Dracula's Great Love
description: The Transylvanian vampire searches for a virgin sacrifice to resurrect his long-dead daughter.

Title: 159. The Legend of Blood Castle
description: An aging Marchioness obsessed with looking youthful devises a vicious plan, under advice from her personal nurse, to look young again.

description: Three rich trustees are murdered - appearing as suicides. When a bus filled with orphans and three other rich trustees has an "accident," Colonel Bingham investigates.

description: After being falsely accused of being insane and put in a asylum so his wicked aunt and her daughters could steal his money, a recently released young man returns to seek the ultimate revenge against them.

description: After rebelling against an abusive John, a Parisian escort is locked in a seedy hotel room in Lyon, where she is forced to submit to the sadomasochistic whims of a parade of clients.

description: Western story about a defiant wife who leaves her husband to take up riding with outlaws.

description: The owner of a roadside diner and his new waitress kill people and feed them to a pen of 12 pigs.

description: Mory, a cowherd, and Anta, a university student, try to make money in order to go to Paris and leave their boring past behind.

description: Light-hearted and occasionally unclothed adaptation of a British comic strip in the over-the-top, on-beyond-Bond spy fantasy vein.

Title: 170. A Touch of Class
description: An insurance man and a recently divorced female fashion designer become clandestine lovers in a London-Spain tryst.

Title: 171. Swap Meat at the Love Market
description: There's no plot to get in the way of the bondage action, as four lovely ladies are securely tied and muzzled in a variety of positions.

Title: 172. The Spook Who Sat by the Door
description: A black man plays 'uncle Tom' in order to gain access to CIA training, then uses that knowledge to plot a new American revolt.

Title: 173. Dr. Tarr's Torture Dungeon
description: The inmates of an insane asylum take over the institution, imprison the doctors and staff, then put into action their own ideas of how the place should be run.

Title: 174. Naughty Wives
description: A young man gets a job as a door-to-door salesman and tries to fight off advances from the female customers.

Title: 175. The Nun and the Devil
description: During the 1570s, in the convent of Sant'Arcangelo di Baiano, after the death of the mother superior, a power struggle rages on, as one nun, who comes from a powerful family, is willing to do anything to become the new abbess.

Title: 176. Stacey
description: The sleazy and dangerous adventures of a gorgeous female private detective.

Title: 177. The House of Seven Corpses
description: A director is filming on location in a house where seven murders were committed. The caretaker warns them not to mess with things they do not understand (the murders were occult related), but the director wants to be as authentic as possible and has his cast re-enact rituals that took place in the house thus summoning a ghoul from the nearby cemetery to bump the whole film crew off one by one.

Title: 178. Night Watch
description: A nervous woman is a witness to murder...but whose?

Title: 179. The Devil's Wedding Night
description: Lady Dracula uses Dracula's ring to lure beautiful girls to her castle, where she murders them so she can bathe in their blood.

Title: 180. Schlock
description: A small town is terrorized by "The Banana Killer", which turns out to be the missing link between man and ape.

Title: 181. Jeremy
description: Shy cellist boy meets upperclassman ballet-student girl at school. They experience first-time love, then happenstance pulls them apart

Title: 182. The Boy Who Cried Werewolf
description: A young boy visits his father in a secluded cabin; the father is attacked by a werewolf and becomes one himself every full moon. However, the boy constantly tries to warn others, but no one will believe him.

Title: 183. The Single Girls
description: A group of swingers at a Caribbean resort are stalked by a mysterious killer.

Title: 184. Tenderness of the Wolves
description: Using his status as a police informant to procure his victims, baby-faced, shaven-headed Fritz Haarmann dismembers their bodies after death and sells the flesh to restaurants, dumping the remainder out of sight.

Title: 185. The Dirty Mind of Young Sally
description: The voluptuous, sultry, foxy owner of a pirate radio station manages to always stay one step ahead of the police who constantly try to put her hot roadshow out of business for good.

Title: 186. Procession of Memories
description: Three brothers are separated after their parents' murder. Years later, their only hope of avenging their parents and reuniting as a family lies in the song they learned as children.

Title: 187. Al otro lado del espejo
description: A nightclub singer is haunted by the ghost of her late father. The dead man summons her through a mirror, forcing her to commit a series of violent crimes.

Title: 188. All Nudity Shall Be Punished
description: Rich, spoiled youngman encounters a prostitute, and gets confused about the nature of his feelings for her; he can't decide between attraction, and repulsion.

Title: 189. Death Carries a Cane
description: A photographer witnesses a murder through a telescope but can't identify the killer. She reports it to police, but other witnesses are found murdered. She may be the next target.

Title: 190. The House That Vanished
description: A young model and her petty thief boyfriend find their way through the English fog to a backwoods manor in hopes of looting it. What they find instead is murder.

Title: 191. The Mad Bomber
description: Los Angeles detectives Minelli and Blake must track down a serial rapist who may know the identity of a mentally disturbed bomber.

Title: 192. The Sinful Bed
description: An antique bed relates passionate stories about various people who have made love on it throughout the decades of the 20th century. Said folks include a sweet young virgin, a sly prostitute who helps a jilted woman get revenge on her unfaithful husband, a German soldier fighting in World War II who's on leave for two hours, and a carefree modern couple.

Title: 193. Steelyard Blues
description: Several misfits decide to restore a PBY flying boat and fly to a place where they can enjoy total freedom but a few obstacles hamper their plans.

Title: 194. The Boss
description: A hitman finds himself embroiled in the middle of a Mafia war between the Sicilians and the Calabrians.

Title: 195. Curse of the Devil
description: A man whose ancestors executed a witch is turned into a werewolf by modern-day descendants of the executed witch.

Title: 196. Horror Rises from the Tomb
description: A warlock's severed head is unearthed centuries after his execution. Reanimated, it seeks to reunite with its body, wreaking havoc as a group encounters its sinister quest.

Title: 197. The Roommates
description: Heather, Beth, Carla, Brea, and Heather's cousin Paula are five lovely young ladies who decide to spend their summer vacation at Lake Arrowhead. While at Lake Arrowhead the women hit the party circuit and get involved with various men in the area. However, things go awry when the gals find themselves the targets of a mysterious murderer.

Title: 198. Hit!
description: A Federal Agent, whose daughter dies of a heroin overdose, is determined to destroy the drug ring that supplied her. He recruits various people whose lives have been torn apart by the drug trade and trains them. Then they all leave for France to track down and destroy the ring.

Title: 199. Son of Dracula
description: Due to be crowned King of the Netherworld by his mentor Merlin the Magician (Ringo Starr) at a monster's convention, Count Downe (Harry Nilsson), the son of Count Dracula, falls in love with the beautiful, but human, Amber (Suzanna Leigh) and finds himself in conflict with Baron Frankenstein (Freddie Jones), who is vying for the same honorary title.

Title: 200. Shock Treatment
description: A French businesswoman goes to a remote and popular rejuvenation clinic after a breakup, and begins to suspect the treatment methods used by the head doctor, and slowly uncovers the horrible secret behind the clinic's success.

Title: 201. The Werewolf of Washington
description: Reporter having affair with president's daughter sent to Hungary, bitten by wolf then transferred back to Washington where bodies appear.

Title: 202. Two Men in Town
description: A former bank robber is released after 10 years in prison. He gets help from a social-worker, but gets harassed by an old cop from his past.

Title: 203. Schoolgirls in Chains
description: Two deranged brothers, who are under the domineering influence of their crazed mother, kidnap young girls and keep them captive in chains in their basement, where they subject them to depraved "games" that often end in torture and murder.

Title: 204. That'll Be the Day
description: Musical drama set in the 1950s ,starring David Essex and Ringo Starr, loosely-based on John Lennon's early years. A gifted but wayward young man finally discovers a sense of purpose when he decides to turn his love of music into a career.

Title: 205. The Man Called Noon
description: An amnesiac gunfighter, aided by a sympathetic outlaw, tries to discover his own identity and past.

Title: 206. Battle of the Amazons
description: A tribe of vicious female warriors terrorizes the countryside, and especially the males, until one day the men and some local villagers decide to fight back.

Title: 207. The Candy Snatchers
description: A nonverbal autistic boy stumbles upon a teenage heiress who has been kidnapped by a trio of young psychopaths, who are intent on extorting diamonds from her stepfather.

Title: 208. Female Prisoner Scorpion: Beast Stable
description: Matsu is sheltered by an incestuous prostitute on her run from the police, her ex-prison mate and a cop whose arm she hacked off.

Title: 209. The Adventures of Mowgli
description: A boy raised by animals learns to live by the laws of the jungle. Full-length version of the Soviet animated series.

Title: 210. Tales That Witness Madness
description: A psychiatrist tells stories of four special cases to a colleague.

Title: 211. Massacre in Rome
description: Rome, March 23, 1944: 33 German soldiers are killed by a bomb. Lt. Col. Herbert Kappler is ordered to execute ten times that many Italians.

Title: 212. Slither
description: A car thief gets out on parole from a penitentiary and intends to go straight. Nonetheless, he ends up in a wild goose chase for stolen cash, together with a small-time bandleader and his wife, and a friendly free-spirited woman.

Title: 213. Battles Without Honor and Humanity
description: During the violent chaos of post-War Japanese black market, a young gangster called Shozo Hirono has to keep up with the rapid shifts of power between unscrupulous bosses.

Title: 214. Crypt of the Living Dead
description: Two archaeologists on a scientific dig come across a vampire burial ground and discover that the creatures are about to awaken and attack a nearby village.

Title: 215. Death Smiles on a Murderer
description: Greta, a mysterious woman with amnesia, is taken in by the wealthy Mr. and Mrs. von Ravensbruck. The three soon enter into a love triangle that turns deadly, as Greta's gruesome past is slowly revealed.

Title: 216. Scream Bloody Murder
description: A deranged kid murders his father and has his arm crushed by the farm tractor. After being discharged from the mental hospital with an amputee, he discovers that his mother has remarried, prompting him to go on a homicidal rampage.

Title: 217. The Bamboo House of Dolls
description: A nurse in a Japanese women's POW camp during World War II masterminds an escapee.

Title: 218. Liebesgrüße aus der Lederhos'n
description: The call-boy, Alfredo, finally goes on a holiday in the Bavarian mountains. However, he has to deal with a lot of competitors.

Title: 219. Hanzo the Razor: The Snare
description: During the currency devaluation by the Edo treasury, officer Hanzo deals with a temple priestess who sells her pupils as prostitutes, and a notorious thief who plans to rob the mint.

Title: 220. Frank & Eva
description: Although Frank is always cheating on her, Eva still cannot bring herself to leave him. But Frank objects when Eva becomes pregnant, as well as when she takes a lover of her own.

Title: 221. Jeewan Rahasya
description: A woman has a fit every evening at the same time. The doctors and psychiatrists doesn't find anything wrong with her. He calls a famous para-psychologists, and the skeletons tumble out of the family cupboard.

Title: 222. Return of the Evil Dead
description: In this second startling film in the BLIND DEAD series, writer/director Amando de Ossorio returns to the horrific origin of the depraved Templar:

Title: 223. A Doll's House
description: Nora Helmer, years earlier, committed a forgery in order to save the life of her authoritarian husband, Torvald. Now she is being blackmailed and lives in fear of her husband finding out and the shame such a revelation would bring to his career. But when the truth comes out, Nora is shocked to learn where she really stands in her husband's esteem.

Title: 224. Love and Pain and the Whole Damn Thing
description: Teenage Walter abandons cycling tour, joins Lila's bus tour in Spain. They develop romance, travel together. Relationship tested during extended stay with Spanish nobility.

Title: 225. The Countess Died of Laughter
description: A man goes to a convent with exciting news, one of the nuns is an heir to a fortune! The man causes the nuns to become obsessed with him as he tries to find the right heir.

Title: 226. The Pyx
description: A police detective uncovers a sinister occult explanation behind the mysterious death of a heroin-addicted prostitute.

Title: 227. The Edifying and Joyous Story of Colinot
description: Colinot is a young, happy man, until the day three highway robbers abduct his fiancee. The search for her leads him to meet so many young, pretty, sexy girls - that when he finally encounters his fiancee, he is no longer sure he loves her.

Title: 228. Campus Pussycats
description: The sexual adventures of young German girls.

Title: 229. The World's Greatest Athlete
description: A down on his luck coach travels to Africa where he spots the world's greatest athlete - a white Tarzan-type. The coach brings him back to the U.S. of A. to compete.

Title: 230. The Wild Little Bunch
description: "The 14" or "Existance" has a mother of 14 children living in poor working class England falling sick and the children try to carry on as a family. Convincing acting from young actors raises this gritty tale above the horizon.

Title: 231. Love in 3-D
description: The 17-year-old Petra in Munich only wants to take care of her friend's apartment, but right on her first evening, the young woman gets to know the frivolous nightlife in the Bavarian metropolis.

Title: 232. Please Don't Eat My Mother!
description: A middle-aged man buys a plant with a sexy voice that develops a craving for insects, frogs, dogs, and humans.

Title: 233. Karate Girl
description: One day five criminals, who just escaped from prison, invades the homes and kills the father and rapes Zeynep. Because of the shock of being raped, Zeynep regains her speech and decides to take revenge on the criminals.

Title: 234. Some Call It Loving
description: A woman who's been asleep for years is part of a carnival that sells her kisses for a buck. A lonely jazz musician buys her. Once awake, the two of them and his two girlfriends hook up. But sometimes, dreams are better than reality.

Title: 235. White Fang
description: The wolf dog, White Fang, aids a reporter, a fur trapper, a nun, a young Eskimo boy and his father of ridding a gold mining town of a sleazy crime lord in 1896 Yukon, Canada.

Title: 236. Hunchback of the Morgue
description: Paul Naschy plays a hunchback with below average intelligence who works at the morgue. He is in love with a sickly girl who happens to be the only person who is kind to him. Each day he brings her flowers until the day she dies. He never really accepts her death and believes she is just sleeping. The girl eventually ends up at the morgue where she is being prepared for burial. Naschy's character flips out at the desecration of the girls body and stabs and decapitates the men in the only scene of gore in the movie. The police begin to look for him. This is when the Hunchback meets up with a mad scientist who's work isn't accepted by the general society. The scientist promises the Hunchback that he would re-animate the girl's body if the Hunchback brings him fresh bodyparts from the graveyard and live victims. He uses the parts to create a monster.

Title: 237. Revolver
description: An Italian prison warden is forced to exchange a French criminal for his kidnapped wife, but they soon find themselves on the trail of a larger conspiracy.

Title: 238. High Crime
description: In Genoa, a righteous police inspector fights to bring down a powerful drug ring, all while key suspects and those closest to him begin to die in more-or-less equal measure.

Title: 239. Manson
description: Documentary on Charles Manson and his family. Has a number of insightful interviews with many family members most notably Squeaky and Sandy (Blue and Red). There is also a history of Manson from his birth to the family formation to the Tate/La Bianca murders. Plenty of footage of the family playing at Spahn Ranch.

Title: 240. 40 Carats
description: Forty-year-old Realtor Ann Stanley vacationing in Greece enjoys a liaison with vacationing twentyish Pete Latham. She then returns to New York and learns that he is dating her daughter. Peter then pursues Ann, who is unsure what to do.

Title: 241. Lucky Luciano
description: Biopic of Mafia boss Lucky Luciano, covering his life from 1946 to 1962 with occasional flashbacks.

Title: 242. Female Prisoner Scorpion: #701's Grudge Song
description: Once again on the lam, Matsu is helped by a strip club worker who holds a grudge against the detective who's trying to find her.

Title: 243. Hostess in Heat
description: A hostess entertains by telling funny and sexy tales.

Title: 244. The Deadly Trackers
description: A Sheriff, who negotiates with bank robbers, ends up getting his family killed during their escape. The Sheriff chases the gang into Mexico on his own. While attempting to exact his vengeance, he is at odds with a Mexican lawman.

Title: 245. Mean Frank and Crazy Tony
description: This is a buddy film with a small-time thug (Victor Lobianco) meeting a high-profile gangster (Lee Van Cleef) while in prison. The pair team up to attempt a prison breakout.

Title: 246. Sex Clinic '74
description: A bunch of high school graduates practice love with their classmates who have a lot of experience, because they spend their free time as escort ladies and therefore earn a lot of money.

Title: 247. Superchick
description: Tara B. True is a flight attendant who makes a weekly swing through New York, Miami, and Los Angeles. In each city, she has a man: Edward, older and wealthy; Johnny, a beach bum with gambling debts; and, Davey, a rock musician on the cusp of success. Tara is a free spirit, faithful to each man in her own way, and so stunning that she dresses in a wig and ill-fitting uniform while she's working so men won't harass her constantly. The low-life whom Johnny is in debt to figures out a way to use Tara to help him execute a daring in-flight robbery. But will Tara stand by helplessly, or is superchick ready for action?

Title: 248. The Young Nurses
description: Sexy young nurses apply special therapy in their daily rounds, as they work against a drug ring operating out of the hospital.

Title: 249. Horror Hospital
description: Jason Jones and Judy Peters, young British people, meet on a train heading to the country. They stay with odd characters in a secluded mansion, where deranged Dr. Christian Storm is using his guests for surgical mind-control experiments.

Title: 250. The Kyoto Connection
description: On a trip to Japan a woman accidentally enters the wrong car. The driver is a sexually frustrated loner.

Title: 251. Because of the Cats
description: A gang of wealthy ne'er do wells rape and terrorize women for fun and force their husbands to watch. A police detective tries to catch them, but can he break their twisted loyalty to one another?

Title: 252. The Neptune Factor
description: When an underwater ocean lab is lost in a earthquake, an advanced submarine is sent down to find it and encounters terrible danger.

Title: 253. Ash Wednesday
description: After getting plastic surgery in Switzerland to help rejuvenate her shaky marriage, Barbara Sawyer has an affair with a younger man while waiting for her husband's arrival from the U.S.

Title: 254. Superdad
description: A father tries to help his daughter meet better friends, only to find his meddling backfires after he finds out that his daughter's friends are the best thing for her.

Title: 255. The Earth Is a Sinful Song
description: A young woman has an intense affair with a womanizing reindeer herdsman.

Title: 256. The Witches Mountain
description: A photojournalist traveling through the Pyrenees on assignment with a beautiful writer stays overnight at an ancient Spanish castle and hears that the adjoining mountain is occupied by a coven of witches.

Title: 257. The Mean Machine
description: After a two-year stint in prison, the son of a murdered Mafia boss teams up with a con-woman to get revenge on the drug smuggler who killed his father and stole his girlfriend.

Title: 258. The Last Train
description: Two people, a Frenchman Julien Maroyeur and a Jewish German woman (Anna Kupfer) met on a train while escaping the German army entering France.

Title: 259. A Name for Evil
description: Dissatisfied with the family architectural business, a man and his wife pack up and move out to his great-grandfather's old house in the country. While trying to patch it up, the house starts to make it clear to him that it doesn't want him there, but the local church (with some off-kilter practices of their own) seems to take a shine to him...

Title: 260. The Naked Ape
description: In a series of live action and animated vignettes, the evolution of humanity is depicted and explored, primarily through the experiences of Cathy, a tour guide in a natural history museum, and Lee, a college student infatuated with her.

Title: 261. The Corruption of Chris Miller
description: Abandoned by their husband/father, a traumatized woman and her disturbed stepdaughter hire a drifter handyman at their secluded estate while a series of murders begins.

Title: 262. A Pain in the Ass
description: Milan must kill Louis Randoni before he testifies in a court of law. He is disturbed by his depressed roommate François Pignon who commits suicide by hanging himself from the toilet pipe flooding Milan's room. Here he is stuck in problems.

Title: 263. Arnold
description: Upon his death, Arnold marries his lover, Karen, in spite of his widow, and leaves deathtraps accompanied by audiotapes and his preserved and articulate corpse for those who cared only for his money.

Title: 264. Psyched by the 4D Witch
description: Novice witch Cindy is transported into a world of safe sex by the voice of Abigail from the 17th century.

Title: 265. Rebel
description: In late 60s New York, a politically motivated group of students plans bombings of company offices who do business with dictators in Middle American countries. But when they contact a bombing specialist, the FBI gets on their track.

Title: 266. A Doll's House
description: Years ago, Nora Helmer (Claire Bloom) committed a forgery in order to save the life of her authoritarian husband Torvald (Sir Anthony Hopkins). Now she is being blackmailed and lives in fear of her husband finding out, and of the shame such a revelation would bring to his career. But when the truth comes out, Nora is shocked to learn where she really stands in her husband's esteem.

Title: 267. Secrets of Sweet Sixteen
description: An erotic anthology revolving around young women and their sexual escapades.

Title: 268. Five on the Black Hand Side
description: In contrast to most of the violence-laden "blaxploitation" films of the period, this low-budget effort eschews exploitation for humanity and domestic drama. Leonard Jackson plays a barber who is also the domineering head of a middle-class African American family. Jackson is forced to rethink his values when his previously docile wife joins their three children in rebelling against her husband's retrogressive behavior.

Title: 269. Oklahoma Crude
description: In 1913, in Oklahoma, oil derrick owner Lena Doyle (Faye Dunaway), aided by her father (Sir John Mills) and a hobo (George C. Scott), is stubbornly drilling for oil despite the pressure from major oil companies to sell her land.

Title: 270. Terror Circus
description: Three showgirls on their way to Las Vegas have stuck all night when their car breaks down. The next morning ,a man offers them help, but, he's really a maniac.

Title: 271. Saudagar
description: A calculative man schemes to deceit a poor but young widow for his personal monetary gains.

Title: 272. Badge 373
description: Grizzled racist cop Eddie Ryan is suspended from the force after a suspect falls off a roof while escaping arrest. Then Eddie's partner Gigi Caputo turns up dead in Brooklyn with his throat cut. Eddie vows to clean up the streets.

Title: 273. The Don Is Dead
description: After his mistress is savagely beaten up a Mafia leader goes after the killer with a bloody vengeance. Soon after the hunt begins, a gang war ensues.

Title: 274. Fly Me
description: Stewardesses battle kung fu killers.

Title: 275. One Little Indian
description: On the run from the Cavalry, a man tries to disappear while accompanied by two camels and a runaway boy. His escape is made harder when he meets a widow and her daughter who may turn him in.

Title: 276. The Doll Squad
description: Squad of beautiful government agents tries to catch saboteurs.

Title: 277. Payday
description: Maury Dann (Rip Torn, in one of his most memorable performances) is a not-so-nice country-Western singer. He ruthlessly manipulates everyone around him to suit his selfish needs...he even gets his limo driver to take the blame for the death of a fan whom he stabbed.

Title: 278. Hiroshima Death Match
description: A young criminal joins a yakuza family to kill the gangsters who beat him up, but falls in love with his boss' widow's niece, piling up enemies and corpses along his wayward way.

Title: 279. Horror High
description: A shock-filled tale of a serious and shy but brilliant science student who, when wrongfully forced to consume a new drug he'd created, becomes a modern day Jekyll and Hyde.

Title: 280. Female Yakuza Tale: Inquisition and Torture
description: Gambling swordswoman Ochô allies with a gang of prostitutes forced by a Yakuza clan - whose boss has kidnapped the daughter of its previous lord - into smuggling drugs in their vaginas.

Title: 281. Vengeance of the Zombies
description: An Indian mystic uses magical chants to raise women from the dead, then sends them out to perform revenge killings for him.

Title: 282. It Happened at Nightmare Inn
description: Two sisters running a small hotel in Spain kill female tourists whose morals do not meet their strict religious standards.

Title: 283. Between the Sheets
description: A young heiress' factories will be lost to inheritance taxes unless she marries the son of the owner of a rival company. Her current lover has the same name as the industrialist's son, and confusion abounds.

Title: 284. Not Now Darling
description: A madcap British farce about mistresses and minks in the London fur salon of Bodley, Bodley and Crouch. Gilbert Bodley plans to sell an expensive mink to a mobster dirt-cheap for his wife, because the wife is Gilbert's mistress and he wants to "close the deal." However, instead of doing his own dirty work, he gets his reluctant partner, Arnold Crouch, to do it for him. Things go awry when the mobster plans to buy it for his OWN mistress, and soon the whole plan goes out the window along with women's clothing and a few other things. Mistaken identities, scantily-clad women kept hidden in closets, mobsters, suspicious wives, and misguided shoppers keep this comedy trucking along in the spirit of the Marx Brothers and "Noises Off" (1992).

Title: 285. Themroc
description: Made without proper language, just gibberish and grunts, this is an absurdist comedy about a man who rejects every facet of normal bourgeois life and turns his apartment into a virtual cave.

Title: 286. The Final Programme
description: A trio of scientists plan to create a self-replicating, immortal, hermaphrodite using the Final Programme developed by a dead, Nobel Prize-winning scientist.

Title: 287. Daddy
description: A fantasy about a woman's attempts to exorcise the influence of her sexually domineering father.

Title: 288. Les confidences érotiques d'un lit trop accueillant
description: Sex comedy about a seductive woman named Dominique, who tells her ex boyfriend Jean-Louis about the sexual history of her little round bed.

Title: 289. The Student Teachers
description: Sexy student teachers at Valley High School give private lessons while being terrorized by a mad rapist.

Title: 290. Blood Orgy of the She-Devils
description: Lorraine and Mark enter the world of witchcraft where Mara foretells the future and helps them remember their past lives. When a series of mysterious murders begin to occur, they turn to Dr. Helsford for advice.

Title: 291. Stateline Motel
description: After a jewelry store robbery in Canada, two Americans meet near the US border to share the loot.

Title: 292. Terror in the Wax Museum
description: The murder of a Wax Museum proprietor and some other strange goings-on in the vicinity prompt a police investigator to determine whether the killer is one of the principles who wants to own the museum or if Jack the Ripper has returned to killing after a hiatus of ten years.

Title: 293. Peg Leg, Musket & Sabre
description: A peg legged pirate is searching for treasure with the help of a young boy, teen girl and a parrot. They'll have to fight Natives and his former crew on the way.

Title: 294. Wicked, Wicked
description: Someone murders and dismembers a series of blonde women; unique in that it is shot entirely in the early 1970's cinema gimmick DUO-VISION (split screen).

Title: 295. Charley and the Angel
description: Charley is a workaholic family man who finds out from an angel that his "number's up" and he will be dying soon, so he tries to change his ways and be a better husband and father with the time he has left.

Title: 296. The Knock Out Cop
description: Adventures of the police inspector "Flatfoot" Rizzo in the slums of Naples.

Title: 297. Der Ostfriesen-Report
description: The owner of a failing Munich strip club sends his manager to an area of the country considered backwards to recruit new talent for his club.

Title: 298. Snake Fist Fighter
description: A old beggar from the woods secretly teaches Chien Fu kung fu as he can't afford regular classes and his "dad" doesn't want him fighting. He grows up, works as waiter and ends up fighting men from his town's crime syndicate.

Title: 299. Bawdy Tales
description: In 1850 Rome, two imprisoned young murderers--Bernardino and Mammone--await their execution, passing their last hours telling each other stories of lust and castration. The first involves a duke and a clergyman castrating themselves while the lusty duchess and a lusty country girl are left alone. The second is about a Calabrese shepherd who leads his unfaithful wife to eat her lover's testicles, thinking they're from cattle. The third deals with the castration of a priest by the young man after whom he was lusting. The last story is about a different sort of menage-a-trois.

Title: 300. Kara Murat: Fatih'in Fermani
description: Fatih Sultan Mehmet conquers Byzantine territory, making Istanbul capital of the Ottoman Empire. The cruel Vlad plunders Turkish villages, so Fatih orders Hamza Pasa to take care of him. Vlad captures the raiders and takes them as captives. Kara Murat whose brother is being kept as Vlad's captive, is sent as a spy to the Sultan.

Title: 301. The Thief Who Came to Dinner
description: A computer programmer decides to become a thief. And when he starts making waves an insurance investigator hounds him. He also meets a woman who becomes his accomplice.

Title: 302. Slaughter's Big Rip-Off
description: Vigilante Slaughter comes under attack from Duncan, a local money launderer whose hit-man traps Slaughter in a car at a cliff, but Slaughter escapes, arms himself, and goes after Duncan's hideout.

Title: 303. Kamouraska
description: Quebec, the 1830s and 1840s. As she attends the bedside of Jérôme, her second husband, Élisabeth recalls her youth, her marriage to her first husband, Antoine, life in remote Kamouraska where he is seigneur, their love dissolving in his mental illness and cruelties, her falling in love with an American physician, Georges Nelson, and the aftermath of Antoine's violent death.

Title: 304. Teenage Intimacies
description: A collection of stories recounting incidents to be seen through keyholes.

Title: 305. I din fars lomme
description: Stine is now eleven and her life and world in a Copenhagen suburb's modern social housing is portrayed in episodes around her family, friends and school.

Title: 306. The Battle of Sutjeska
description: In 1943, 20,000 Yugoslav partisans led by Tito find themselves encircled by 120,000 well-armed Axis troops in the mountains of Bosnia and must fight to the death to break out.

Title: 307. Gawain and the Green Knight
description: The medieval legend of a supernatural knight who challenges the king's men to kill him.

Title: 308. Facets of Love
description: A brothel, which was founded during the Ming Dynasty, steams with tales of imperial erotic myths, trysts and twists of pleasurable indulgence, and sometimes violent nature.

Title: 309. I Escaped from Devil's Island
description: In 1916, A group of prisoners plot their escape from the notorious fortress located in French Guiana.

Title: 310. Legend of the Sex Thief in Edo
311. Anna: The Pleasure, the Torment
description: A beautiful but poor young girl finds all the money and material goods she never had when she becomes the girlfriend of a crime boss, but soon learns that there is a price to be paid for that kind of life.

Title: 312. The Dirty Dolls
description: Johnny recruits teenagers for criminal activities. During a diamond heist, they take hostages. Johnny plans to kill witnesses, but his sister in the gang opposes his extreme methods, causing internal conflict within the criminal operation.

Title: 313. A Super Fêmea
description: Beautiful model is hired to star a campaign to sell a new product: the male contraceptive pill. But it isn't easy to win the confidence of its target market, since people believe it causes impotence.

Title: 314. Tango 2001
description: Joachim is an impotent man who secretly films his friend Stathis having sex with girls from the Tango Club. When Stathis kills a lesbian, the death is caught on film.

Title: 315. The All-American Girl
description: Debbie's boyfriend Bobby has left for Guatemala for three months and Debbie is expecting a boring summer. But then she hasn't considered her neighbors and their 15-year old son Johnny.

Title: 316. The Serpent
description: A Soviet diplomat hatches a complicated plan to enable him to defect to the West.

Title: 317. Bust Out
description: The Browns take their Catholic high school students on a picnic. As one student sneaks to her boyfriend, two others seduce escaped convicts who rape the fourth. Mrs. Brown and her husband fall victims to their prudence.

Title: 318. Sensuela
description: A Lappish girl, the only daughter of a reindeer herder, rescues a crashed German fighter pilot during WW2. The two develop warm feelings for each other during his convalescence.

Title: 319. I Like the Girls Who Do
description: To get an inheritance from his uncle, a young man must make love to seven women in 7 days. He goes through so much to get the inheritance in this typical farce.

Title: 320. No Sex Please - We're British
description: A mistaken address causes a newlywed couple's apartment to fill up with mail-order Swiss porn... right before a visit by the wife's father, a bank president who happens to be the husband's new employer. From the Broadway play.

Title: 321. Mistress Pamela
description: Loosely bases on Samuel Richardson's novel Pamela or Virtue Rewarded, this is the story of Pamela who goes to work in the kitchen of Lord Devenish who is determined to rape her.

Title: 322. When Love Is Lust
description: Emilia, product of a cloistered education and an aristocratic lineage is thrown into the arms of a brash parvenu, who she marries but refuses to consummate her marriage.

Title: 323. Johnny Corncob
description: A traditional Hungarian poetic fairytale that describes the epic adventures of a young shepherd through love, war, magic and death.

Title: 324. From the Mixed-Up Files of Mrs. Basil E. Frankweiler
description: Precocious Claudia and her brother run away from home and hide in the Metropolitan Museum in New York.

Title: 325. Women in Cell Block 7
description: A woman goes behind bars in order to save her father's life.

Title: 326. The House in Nightmare Park
description: In 1907, an actor is invited to perform in an isolated country house, and becomes involved in mysterious and dangerous events.

Title: 327. Two People
description: Evan Bonner is an army deserter who returns home to deal with the fallout of his actions. He becomes distracted when he meets attractive model Diedre McCluskey, thinking he's fallen in love.

Title: 328. The Hanging Woman
description: A man discovers the corpse of a young woman hanging in a cemetery.

Title: 329. Unterm Dirndl wird gejodelt
description: Heidi tries to improve her grades at school by having sex with her teacher. When she returns to her parent's home somewhere in Bavaria, she starts to spend an unusual amount of time with the male population of her village.

Title: 330. Naked Over the Fence
description: In a small town, an arcade owner, a teacher, and a singer's lives intersect. When the singer and her friend land roles in a film, they uncover its true nature. Amidst scandal and a sudden murder, their worlds are turned upside down.

Title: 331. Loafer
description: Guilt ridden Ranjit, a skilled high profile thief, even at the cost of being arrested, must make grand arrangements for the wedding of the daughter of an destituted old man whose teenage son was killed by Ranjeet in their childhood.

Title: 332. Simbad e il califfo di Bagdad
description: The sailor Sinbad is dragged by two cheaters on board a ship on which the beautiful Sherazade travels, promised to the Caliph of Baghdad.

Title: 333. Happy New Year
description: Released from prison apparently under a New Year amnesty, a criminal tries to pick up the threads of a life changed not only by his daring plan to rob a jewelry store in out-of-season Cannes, but also by a very special someone he met there.

Title: 334. A Slightly Pregnant Man
description: When a male driving school owner goes to see his doctor with complaints of feeling run down, he is pronounced four months pregnant. When the diagnosis is confirmed by a specialist, the result is an international media frenzy.

Title: 335. Giordano Bruno
description: Fleeing from his enemies in the Catholic Church, the free thinking philosopher, poet and scientist Giordano Bruno (1548-1600) has found some protection in Venice. But the Roman Inquisition, fearing his influence in Europe, wants to bring him on trial for heresy.

Title: 336. I Will Walk Like a Crazy Horse
description: Running away from the police, Aden goes to the desert where he meets an uncivilized man who has a special link with Mother-Earth. He ends up by convincing the hermit to come along with him into another desert... the big town!

Title: 337. No Way Out
description: A mob hitman wants to retire, but his bosses don't think that's a good idea. Complications and many bloody shootouts ensue.

Title: 338. Blade
description: A homicide detective goes after a woman-hating serial killer, who uses knives to murder his victims.

Title: 339. Yarasa Adam Betmen
description: An early Turkish Batman movie based on the famous comic characters, with his name spelled the Turkish pronunciation (Bedmen). The unfortunate erotic evocations of the title have nothing to do with the plot.

Title: 340. Love Brides of the Blood Mummy
description: A revived mummy needs the blood of young women to slake his thirst.

Title: 341. The Violent Professionals
description: When his colleague is murdered by an organised criminal gang, a Milanese cop goes undercover to continue the investigation and single-handedly destroy the organization from within.

Title: 342. Harry in Your Pocket
description: A would-be criminal is taken in by a professional in the game, who teaches him how pickpockets work in teams.

Title: 343. Girls Are for Loving
description: Ginger is back, more daring than before as she takes you through heart pounding scenes of violence and gripping lust. Ginger's hard hitting display of martial arts could be performed by nobody more beautiful.

Title: 344. The Bodyguard
description: Karate master and anti-drug vigilante Kiba returns to his home in Japan, where he aims to wipe out the nation's drug industry.

Title: 345. Mad Memories of a Lifeguard
description: In several episodes, Berlin lifeguards talk about their sexual experiences. One is called to a noble villa for swimming lessons and, in addition to the daughters of the house, soon also has to take care of their sexually frustrated mom.

Title: 346. Warlock Moon
description: A college girl meets a reporter, they take a trip to the country, and they wind up meeting a creepy old woman who lives in a closed-down resort.

Title: 347. Murder in a Blue World
description: A nurse tries to bring her own style of relief to miserable people, or ones condemned to die. Her identity is a mystery, and she may not be quite what she seems.

Title: 348. The Legend of Paul and Paula
description: Paul and Paula have had bad experiences with love: Paul is financially well off but has lost all affection for his wife, and Paula leads a troublesome life raising two children on her own. They meet and discover a strong passion for each other. Life seems like a dream when they're together - but their short flights from the burdens of reality are once and again interrupted by Paul's ties to family and career.

Title: 349. Merry-Go-Round
description: Adaptation of Arthur Schnitzler's famous play "Reigen", previously filmed as "La Ronde" by Max Ophüls in 1950 and Roger Vadim in 1964.

Title: 350. Butterflies
description: 12-year-old Edek visits his aunt on vacation. Along with his cousins, he meets the charming Monika. They fall for each other until Monika leaves Edka for a rich kid. Cousin Honorka, also in love with Edek, reveals Monika's secret.

Title: 351. Property Is No Longer a Theft
description: A neurotic Marxist bank teller quits his job and sets his sights on stealing everything - from tools to a mistress - from one of his former clients, a successful butcher.

Title: 352. Even Angels Eat Beans
description: Striving for a higher standard of living, a former ice-cream man and a wrestler convince a well-known mobster to hire them. However, they both soon realize that criminal life is not what they were looking for.

Title: 353. A Leopard Never Changes Its Spots
description: Antonis, who is in love with Roula, must find a way to convince her brother to allow him to marry her.

Title: 354. Sex of the Witch
description: In a secluded mansion, the Hilton patriarch dies, leaving several nieces and nephews. Soon, one of the heirs is murdered by a strange killer, under the instructions of a mysterious woman who seeks the demise of the Hilton family line.

Title: 355. The Naughty Stewardesses
description: Sexy air stewardesses - four naughty female flight attendants - become involved with a wealthy womanizer, with unsurprising results. They live out their wildest sexual softcore nude fantasies.

Title: 356. Ein Käfer auf Extratour
description: Jimmy Bondi and his miracle beetle Dudu take part in a car stunt show in Liverpool, England, at the request of their friend Aldo Regozzani.

Title: 357. Idaho Transfer
description: Scientists at a government-funded research complex use a time machine they developed to secretly 'transfer' young researchers fifty-six years into the future after they discover Earth is soon to suffer a worldwide disaster.

Title: 358. Lady Ice
description: An insurance investigator romances a wealthy young beauty when he suspects she may be involved in fencing stolen jewels.

Title: 359. Ivan Vasilyevich Changes His Profession
description: An ordinary Soviet building manager, living in the 20th century, looks like Tsar of All Rus' - Ivan IV the Terrible (1530 - 1584). He'd never known this, until his neighbor created a time machine.

Title: 360. The Olsen Gang Runs Amok
description: Nobody picks Egon Olsen up after 8 months in prison. Benny and Kjeld now work at a grocery store. Egon decides to steal the DKK6,000,000+ from a criminal's safe alone, before the cops raid the place.

Title: 361. The Five Days
description: In 1848 Milan, a thief and a baker witness the chaotic final days of the Italian Revolution.

Title: 362. Daag: A Poem of Love
description: Sunil is convicted of murder and is on the run. But the long arm of the law and his past finally catch up with him. Can he outrun his destiny for long?

Title: 363. When Taekwondo Strikes
description: During the Japanese occupation of Korea, the leader of a resistance movement, who's also a Taekwondo master, and his apprentices struggle against the brutal Japanese occupiers, aided by a Chinese female martial artist.

Title: 364. The Soul of Nigger Charley
description: After the end of the Civil War, Charley fights against a group of Southern soldiers seeking to reignite the Confederacy.

Title: 365. Seven Deaths in the Cats Eyes
description: Someone is killing the residents of an old castle, which is haunted by a legend involving vampirism.

Title: 366. The Lonely Woman
description: Based on José Antonio García Blázquez's novel of the same name, the film tells the story of Jacinto Martín del Río, AKA 'Jaci', a fatherless lad who feels a strong love almost unhealthy for his mother, a bourgeois widow with unclear virtues. Anyway, that will not be an obstacle for him to notice other women.

Title: 367. Kid Blue
description: At the turn of the century, with the Old West fading away, Texas train robber Kid Blue goes straight and takes a factory job but old habits die hard.

Title: 368. Blume in Love
description: The lawyer Stephen Blume, who specializes in divorces, is living a paradoxical situation where, having broken up his marriage, is still in love with his ex-girlfriend.

Title: 369. Teenage Tramp
description: Wayward, uninhibited young runaway Kim has fallen in with a bad crowd. She decides to flee them and head to the West Coast to reunite with her uptight, neurotic, estranged older sister Hilary so that she can collect some of the inheritance left behind by their deceased parents. However, evil drug dealer Maury and his flock follow Kim to Hilary's house.

Title: 370. Yalanci Yarim
description: A young man living on his wealthy big brother's money tries to deceive him about having a fiancée. He enlists a girl from a poor family to pose as his beloved, but his brother insists on seeing the wedding.

Title: 372. Cries of Ecstasy, Blows of Death
description: Year 2062, the land is barren, post-apocalyptic vision of hell on earth. Environmental pollution, human callousness and evil. Marauding gangs of motorcyclists, violence and rape.

Title: 373. Namak Haraam
description: Somnath (Somu) lives in a shanty house in a Delhi slum with his widowed mom, and unmarried sister, Sarla. He is friendly with Calcutta-based wealthy Vikram (Vicky) Maharaj. When Vicky's dad, Damodar, has a heart attack and is advised to take bed-rest for two months, Vicky fills in his father's shoes, has a confrontation with a senior employee and union leader, Bipinlal Pandey, which results in a strike. His father intervenes, asks Vicky to apologize to Bipinlal, which Vicky does, and everything returns to normal. Vicky confides about his humiliation with Somu, and both conspire to teach Bipinlal a lesson. As a result, Somu accompanies Vicky to Calcutta, gets a job as a laborer in his mill, befriends his fellow-workers, gets some monetary relief to injured workers, amongst other benefits, is elected as the union leader replacing Bipinlal. With Somu as the union leader and Vicky as the boss there is no stopping these two - until Damodar finds out and decides to put a stop to Vicky being influenced by Somu's middle-class ideas and ideals. Damodar starts a chain of events that get out of control, events that may well see the death of one of the friends at the hands of the other. Will Vicky's and Somu's friendship see them through or will it also be a casualty?

Title: 374. Submersion of Japan
description: The shorted re-edited American version of Submersion of Japan, in which Japan slowly sinks into the sea as the US and Japan work together to stop it.

Title: 375. Prem Parvat
description: Rani, an orphan girl brought up by a money-minded uncle who has married her off to an old 'Choudhri.' Rani's dreams are rekindled when she meets and falls in love with a young, handsome forest officer. The plot navigates her conflicted feelings of loyalty to her old husband and her love for the young officer.

Title: 376. Abhimaan
description: A popular singer convinces his new wife to enter show-business, but his pride is wounded when she outshines him.

Title: 377. Onna jigoku: Mori wa nureta
